name: Goddon Needs to Change
description:
Created originally  for theGoGodot Jam 3 with the theme "Evolution".

Inspired by puzzle Games like Eets Munchies and Bad Piggies, we help a little monster adapt to any situation to achieve their goal.

Parts of the code where inspired/repurposed from thingymajigsaw

First game ever released with Godot. Hope you enjoy this short experience, i'm open to any comment you could have.
